about_the_game:
In this action packed adventure game, explore a mysterious land infested with ghosts and creatures to find out the truth about your past. Collect hats with unique powers that can help you overcome challenges and change the way you play. Solve puzzles and do quests to get interesting rewards. There are many to secrets to uncover and evil creatures to defeat.

The land that you explore is highly unstable. The world changes its form on a daily basis due to mysterious circumstances. It is up to you to stop whatever is causing this.

  • Over 50 unique hats to collect
  • Many challenging bosses and enemies
  • Tons of quests and interesting characters
  • Many areas to explore
  • Many secrets to uncover
